topic: More Sky HDRs from LBNL's Skycam at FLEXLAB
body:
Daylight Simulation Enthusiasts,


I've uploaded sample HDR sky data for equinox and winter solstice from our
sky camera at FLEXLAB to compliment the summer solstice data previously
available: http://flexskycam.lbl.gov/


Has anyone tried to use these? I'd like to know what you did and how it
went.


Best,
Andy
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2015-January/010691.html).</sup>
